vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ζακχαῖος, -ου, ὁ (Heb. זַכַּי, cf. Neh.7:14, I Est.2:9, LXX Ζακχού),
Zaccai, Zacchaeus, a publican: Luk.19:2, 5 19:8 (cf. 2Ma.10:19).†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Luk.19.2
§ Zacchaeus, "righteous one, pure one"
Zaccheus, (Proper name), Lk. 19:2, 5, 8*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
撒該 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "純淨"
一個稅吏長
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
撒该 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "纯净"
一个税吏长
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: : ông là người giàu có, sống tại Giê-ri-cô. Xem H2140
